name: Flame Wars
description:
Developed for #openjam2018, this multiplayer game about internet arguments will challenge your hand-eye coordination.

2 players compete to see who can mash buttons the fastest. xinput controllers are required. If you have a pair of Xbox 360 controllers, you're good to go!

Flame Wars is licensed under GPL-3.0. An original soundtrack by Colin Rupprecht was created just for the game, and is licensed under CC-BY-SA-4.0.

Source code: https://gitlab.com/midnasquad/flamewar
Original soundtrack: https://midnasquad.bandcamp.com/album/flame-wars-ost
